name: Every Path to Purgatory
description:
(Ver. 0.0.1)

You awaken in a place far removed from our world. What you find there is a problem, a solution (perhaps), and maybe a friend or two.

''Every Path to Purgatory'' is (hopefully) the first in a series of CYOA-style pieces of interactive fiction based on a set of my dreams involving life, death, and the gathering and hunting of stray souls... it's complicated, don't ask. >.>;

This version is for general testing. (First release will be 0.1.0., after which I'll consider the project 'done'...) It currently features 4 endings, two major paths, a fairly sight-friendly font and color palatte, and about three editing passes... about.

My endgoal will, hopefully, be about 10-15 endings, hand-drawn illustrations, full sound and music, and a digital concept art book for those so generous to buy the files.
